div.style: display: inline-block; background-color: #d9e0e7; padding: 6px; margin: 4px; border: 1px solid #8da1b4; border-radius: 5px; line-height: 60%

div.p: title: Update of End leave - RE_SLOR
description: Testing correct use of Update of end leave

tr.td: FHIR Client (Details: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/testscript-profile-origin-types code FHIR-Client = 'FHIR Client', stated as 'null')
FHIR Server (Details: http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/testscript-profile-destination-types code FHIR-Server = 'FHIR Server', stated as 'null')

blockquote.p: name: Create a HospitalNotification STIN Message 01
description: Post HospitalNotification to the server.

tr.td: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is okay or created.
Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected eventCoding.code.
Confirm that the Encounter class of the request resource is IMP.
Confirm that the Encounter status of the request resource is in-progress.
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected activity code.
Confirm that the report of admission flag is true.
Confirm that the target reference in Provenance equals MessageHeader.id
Confirm that the episodeOfCare-identifier has the structure of an UUID
Confirm that the a receiver of the report of admission exists, when the flag is true, and doesn't exists when the flag is false.

blockquote.p: name: Create a HospitalNotification STOR Message 02
description: Post HospitalNotification to the server.

tr.td: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is okay or created.
Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the previous MessageHeader fullURL is identical to Provenance.entity.what
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected eventCoding.code.
Confirm that the role is set to revision. Not used when testing the first message in a stream
Confirm that the Encounter class of the request resource is IMP.
Confirm that the Encounter status of the request resource is onleave.
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected activity code.
Confirm that the target reference in Provenance equals MessageHeader.id
Confirm that the 2 Provenance instances exists.
Confirm that the episodeOfCare-identifier is episodeOfCareID-STIN

blockquote.p: name: Create a HospitalNotification SLOR Message 03
description: Post HospitalNotification to the server.

tr.td: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is okay or created.
Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the previous MessageHeader fullURL is identical to Provenance.entity.what
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected eventCoding.code.
Confirm that the role is set to revision. Not used when testing the first message in a stream
Confirm that the Encounter class of the request resource is IMP.
Confirm that the Encounter status of the request resource is in-progress.
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected activity code.
Confirm that the target reference in Provenance equals MessageHeader.id
Confirm that the 3 Provenance instances exists.
Confirm that the episodeOfCare-identifier is episodeOfCareID-STOR

blockquote.p: name: Create a HospitalNotification RE-SLOR Message 04
description: Post HospitalNotification to the server.

tr.td: Confirm that the returned HTTP status is okay or created.
Confirm that the client request payload contains a Bundle resource type.
Confirm that the previous MessageHeader fullURL is identical to Provenance.entity.what
Confirm that the request resource contains the expected eventCoding.code.

Confirm that the 4 Provenance instances exists.
Confirm that the episodeOfCare-identifier is episodeOfCareID-SLOR
